abstract: As Monday brought reports that Citigroup is pursuing a deal to buy a hedge fund, Old Lane, New York magazine observes that many otherwise well-informed people are still not entirely clear on what, exactly, a hedge fund is. For these people, the magazine’s latest cover story offers a refreshingly simple (but long) introduction to hedge funds, as well as a few voyeuristic sidebars about fund managers’ spending and marrying habits.
